awe6.core.Encrypter

type
class
implements
awe6.interfaces.IEncrypter
The Encrypter class provides a minimalist implementation of the IEncrypter interface.

For API documentation please review the corresponding Interfaces.

Constructor

new(p_defaultSecret : String)

Instance Methods

decrypt( p_value : haxe.io.Bytes, ?p_secret : String ) : haxe.io.Bytes

encrypt( p_value : haxe.io.Bytes, ?p_secret : String ) : haxe.io.Bytes
